infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Travel Journal to use your camera to take photos and attach them to your travel entries.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Travel Journal to access your photo library so you can add existing photos to your journal entries.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Travel Journal to use your microphone to record short voice notes or transcriptions for your entries.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Travel Journal to access your location to tag entries with the place where they were created and show the city and country.

plugins.photosPermission: Travel Journal accesses your photos so you can add them to your travel entries.

plugins.cameraPermission: Travel Journal uses your camera to take photos and attach them to your journal entries.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Travel Journal uses your location to tag where your entries were created and display the place name.

plugins.iosMicrophonePermission: Travel Journal uses the microphone to record short voice notes or transcriptions for your entries.
